titleText: The greatest risk with AI is not moving fast enough to deploy it:Microsoft
mainText: If there are only a handful of companies running AI, then it's unlikely that it will be applied broadly enough, according to Microsoft's strategic policy advisor Dave Heiner. The greatest risk relating to artificial intelligence (AI).

titleText: How Microsoft’s Dona Sarkar Keeps Her Future Self On Track
